summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the South Lake Union Streetcar, authorizing the Director of the Seattle Department of Transportation to enter into an agreement to exchange real property owned by the City of Seattle in Lots 1, 2, 3 and 4, Block 106, D.T. Denny's 1st Addition to the City of Seattle, Washington, for land owned by City Investors VII, LLC in Lots 1, 2, 3, and 4, and 5, Block 3, Fairview Homestead Association for the Benefit of Mechanics and Laborers, Seattle, Washington, to give and accept deeds on behalf of the City to effectuate the transaction, and to accept and deposit funds in connection with the sale.
